response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item holds immense value to us, encapsulating years of innovation and dedication to quality. We believe its worth far exceeds its tangible cost, making it an invaluable addition to any collection or endeavor.

We are extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this product for $950,000. This generous discount reflects our confidence in its exceptional qualities and our desire to ensure it finds the right owner who will appreciate and cherish it as we do.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. We are here to answer any questions you might have and provide all necessary information to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
